alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER AND SOUTHEASTERN LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 830 AM EDT... At 759 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lebanon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph and pea to dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Ephrata, Annville, Cornwall, Myerstown, Denver, Reamstown, Pleasant Hill, Sand Hill, Newmanstown, Lebanon South, Cleona, Adamstown, Avon, Richland, Brickerville, Terre Hill, Schaefferstown, Quentin and Churchtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
